doc:
Theo Marcuse https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Theo_Marcuse 0 Theodore Carroll Marcuse (August 2, 1920 – November 29, 1967) was an American character actor who appeared frequently on television in the 1950s and 1960s. His sinister, hulking countenance was enhanced by a shaven head that accentuated his elephantine ears. Theodore_Carroll_Marcuse ( August_2_,_1920 – November_29_,_1967 ) was an_American_character_actor who appeared frequently on television in the_1950s_and_1960s . His_sinister_,_hulking_countenance was_enhanced by a_shaven_head that accentuated his_elephantine_ears .
